card.name: Ral's Vanguard
card.property: Requirement — Your starting deck contains only instant, sorcery, and land cards. Starting hand size +1 Starting life total -5 If an instant or sorcery spell you cast would cause you to draw one or more cards, draw an additional card. If an instant or sorcery spell you cast would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals 1 additional damage to that permanent or player.

card.name: Banding Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

card.name: Baneslayer Aspirant
card.property: Baneslayer Aspirant gets +3/+3 and has flying, first strike, and lifelink as long as you have one or more emblems.

card.name: Enroll in the Coalition
card.property: You are a Flagbearer. While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer if able.

card.name: Five Kids in a Trenchcoat
card.property: Five Kids in a Trenchcoat counts as five creatures for spells and effects that count the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Frontier Explorer
card.property: {3}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may play one basic Plains card from outside the game.

card.name: Imaginary Friends
card.property: Create three 0/0 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Metagamer
card.property: Cards in the winning deck(s) of the latest Mythic Championship cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Priority Avenger
card.property: Flying Players can't cast instant spells unless a spell or ability is on the stack.

card.name: Ruff, Underdog Champ
card.property: All Hounds are Dogs. (We'll errata this to be true.) First strike, lifelink Underdog — If you've lost a game this match, Ruff, Underdog Champ and other Dogs you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Sarah's Wings
card.property: Target creature or player gains flying until end of turn. (Players with flying can't be dealt damage by creatures without flying.)

card.name: Scaled Destruction
card.property: Choose one or more— • Destroy all small creatures. • Destroy all medium creatures. • Destroy all large creatures. (A small creature has total power and toughness 4 or less, medium is 5-8, and large is 9 or more.)

card.name: Stack of Paperwork
card.property: When Stack of Paperwork enters the battlefield, draw a card. Combat damage uses the stack. (Combat damage assignment can be responded to before damage is dealt. You know, like it used to.)

card.name: Wizened Arbiter
card.property: When Wizened Arbiter enters the battlefield, you may reveal a white card you own from outside the game. If you do, exchange that card with a card in your hand.

card.name: You're in Command
card.property: Choose target creature you own and control. That creature becomes your commander. Any other commanders you have are no longer your commander. (That creature starts with a commander tax of {0}.)

card.name: Animate Spell
card.property: Flash Enchant instant or sorcery spell on the stack When Animate Spell becomes attached to an instant or sorcery, put that card onto the battlefield under its owner's control. It's a creature in addition to its other types with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. When Animate Spell leaves the battlefield, enchanted card's owner sacrifices it unless they cast it.

card.name: Biting Remark
card.property: Scrycast {0} (If you see this card while scrying, you may reveal it and cast it by paying {0}.) Flying

card.name: Command the Chaff
card.property: Look at target opponent's sideboard. You may cast a card from that sideboard without paying its mana cost. Exile Command the Chaff.

card.name: Control Win Condition
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Shroud Control Win Condition's power and toughness are each equal to the number of turns you've taken this game. (If this is in your deck, please keep track of your turns. This means you, Mark.)

card.name: Do-Over
card.property: Restart the turn, except with Do-Over in exile. (First, return all cards to where they were as the turn began. For information from hidden zones like the hand, reconstruct as best you can, and do the rest at random.)

card.name: Enchantmentize
card.property: Enchant creature or enchantment Enchanted permanent is an enchantment and loses all other card types. (It still has its abilities, but it's no longer a creature.)

card.name: Form of the Mulldrifter
card.property: When Form of the Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. You may cast creature cards from your hand as though they were the card Mulldrifter. (You can still evoke this way. They're Mulldrifters.)

card.name: Innocuous Insect
card.property: Buyback {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Flash Flying When you cast this spell, draw a card.

card.name: Khod, Etlan Shiis Envoy
card.property: All lands are Islands in addition to their other types. Other Homarids, Camarids, Cephalids, Nautilids, and Merfolk you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Learned Learner
card.property: As long as you have a maximum hand size other than 7, Learned Learner has "{T}: Draw a card."

card.name: Loopy Lobster
card.property: Four-faced (Whenever this becomes tapped, move it to the next stage, or to stage 1 if it's at stage 4.) Stage 1—(1/4) Stage 2—(4/1) Evolve Stage 3—(2/4) {U}: Loopy Lobster gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Stage 4—(4/4) Vigilance. {T}: Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Memory Bank
card.property: Draw a card. Bank (If you cast Memory Bank from your hand, exile it until the end of the match. You may cast it from exile during another game this match. It still counts toward your deck minimum.)

card.name: Recycla-bird
card.property: Flying When Recycla-bird dies, put a flying counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Squidnapper
card.property: When Squidnapper enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until Squidnapper leaves the battlefield or that player pays the ransom. Ransom—{6} and 2 life

card.name: The Grand Tour
card.property: Exile target permanent, then put it into its owner's hand. That player discards that card, then puts it on top of their library. Then they put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Time Sidewalk
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one. If this card is in your opening hand, you may exile it. If you do, create four Time Walk token cards and shuffle them into your deck.

card.name: Truth or Dare
card.property: Target opponent chooses one — • Truth — That player plays with their hand revealed for the rest of the game. • Dare — Mill all but the bottom ten cards of that player's library. (To mill, put the top card of that library into its owner's graveyard.)

card.name: Visitor from Planet Q
card.property: All creature cards you own with flash are instants in addition to their other types. Whenever you cast another spell with two or more card types, you may draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Blood Poet
card.property: Spark (Activate spark abilities by spending or giving yourself spark counters. Activate only one spark ability per turn, and only as a sorcery.) +1: Blood Poet gains lifelink until end of turn. -3: Target opponent discards a card. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Bone Rattler
card.property: When Bone Rattler is put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it. When you do, create four Reassembling Skeleton token cards and put them into your graveyard.

card.name: Buried Ogre
card.property: You may begin the game with Buried Ogre in your graveyard. If you do, you lose 1 life.

card.name: Celestine Cave Witch
card.property: When Celestine Cave Witch enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Insect creature tokens. Whenever Celestine Cave Witch attacks, you may sacrifice an Insect. When you do, curse defending player. (Create a black Aura Curse enchantment token that's attached to that player. It has enchant player and "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.")

card.name: Chimney Goyf
card.property: Flying Chimney Goyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1. When Chimney Goyf dies, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

card.name: Corrupted Key
card.property: As long as Corrupted Key is tapped, creatures you control have menace and deathtouch.

card.name: Cyclopean Titan
card.property: When Cyclopean Titan dies, two target lands become Swamps. Exile Cyclopean Titan. {3}, {T}: Tap target creature, then return Cyclopean Titan to its owner's hand.

card.name: Everlasting Lich
card.property: Everlasting Lich can't block. Everlasting Lich can't die. (This creature has indestructible, can't be sacrificed, and doesn't go to the graveyard for having 0 toughness.)

card.name: Frogkin Kidnapper
card.property: When Frogkin Kidnapper enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card from it. Ransom that card. (Exile it. Its owner may pay {3} at any time to return it to their hand.)

card.name: Gunk Slug
card.property: When Gunk Slug enters the battlefield, create three Gunk token cards and shuffle them into target opponent's library. (Gunk is a colorless sorcery card with no mana cost that has cycling {4}.)

card.name: Largepox
card.property: Each player discards a card, then loses 1 life, then sacrifices an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, a land, a planeswalker, and a tribal permanent, then exiles a card from their graveyard, then puts the top card of their library into their graveyard, then removes a counter from a permanent they control, then gets a poison counter.

card.name: One with Death
card.property: You lose the game.

card.name: Spellmorph Raise Dead
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Spellmorph {B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Cast it any time for its spellmorph cost.)

card.name: Sunimret
card.property: Reverse miracle {B} (If this card is on the bottom of your library as you begin searching it, you may cast it by paying its reverse miracle cost.) Exile all creatures.

card.name: Swarm of Locus
card.property: Flying Whenever Swarm of Locus attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Locus you control.

card.name: Underdark Beholder
card.property: Underdark Beholder enters the battlefield with ten eyestalk counters on it. If Underdark Beholder would be dealt damage, remove that many eyestalk counters from it instead. If you can't, sacrifice it. Whenever Underdark Beholder attacks, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an instant, sorcery, or enchantment card with converted mana cost less than the number of eyestalk counters on Underdark Beholder. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Shuffle your library.

card.name: Witty Demon
card.property: Flying When Witty Demon enters the battlefield, if your starting library had at least 13 cards over the minimum, search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. Otherwise, Witty Demon deals 4 damage to you.

card.name: Xyru Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Xyru Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card unless they challenge you. If challenged, and you show them two black cards in your hand, they must discard two cards.

card.name: Yawgmoth's Testament
card.property: Until end of turn, you may play face-up cards you own from exile. If a card would be put into your graveyard or exile from anywhere this turn, put it on the bottom of your library instead.

card.name: Bombardment
card.property: Until end of turn, cards you own that aren't on the battlefield lose all card types, costs, names, and abilities and become red sorceries named Missile that cost {R} with "Missile deals 2 damage to any target."

card.name: High Troller
card.property: All targeted spells and abilities cost {2} less and have their targets chosen randomly.

card.name: Impatient Iguana
card.property: If Impatient Iguana is in your opening hand and you're not the starting player, you may reveal it. If you do, you become the starting player. Haste

card.name: Lazier Goblin
card.property: Motivate {3}{R} (This creature can't attack or block unless you have paid its motivate cost once. Motivate only as a sorcery.) When Lazier Goblin enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Lightning Colt
card.property: When Lightning Colt enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Mana Abundance
card.property: If a player would add mana, instead all players add that mana.

card.name: Planequake
card.property: Planequake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker. If X is 10 or more, open the "Uncovered Cavern" plot booster.

card.name: Problematic Volcano
card.property: When Problematic Volcano enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to any target. Then, starting with you, each player assigns their creatures to the left or right of the volcano. Creatures enter the battlefield to the left or right of the volcano. Creatures can't block creatures on the other side of the volcano.

card.name: Queue of Beetles
card.property: Haste The stack is now first in, first out instead of last in, first out. (The first spell or ability on the stack is the first one to resolve.)

card.name: Red Herring
card.property: {1} {U}: Exchange Red Herring from your hand with a permanent you control on the battlefield or a spell you control on the stack. If that permanent or spell was the target of a spell or ability, change that target to Red Herring.

card.name: Seasoned Weaponsmith
card.property: Tasty (This creature can be attacked directly. If it is attacked, it can't block creatures that didn't attack it.)

card.name: Siege Elemental
card.property: Trample Untapped creatures can't block. Tapped creatures can block.

card.name: Throat Wolf
card.property: You may cast Throat Wolf during an opponent's combat phase. Firstest strike (This creature deals combat damage to creatures before creatures with first strike.) After each opponent's first combat phase of each turn, there is an additional combat phase. Only Throat Wolf can attack during that combat phase.

card.name: Tibalt the Chaotic
card.property: +1: Cast a copy of one of the following cards chosen at random—Ignorant Bliss, Crack the Earth, Blazing Volley. −3: Cast a copy of one of the following cards chosen at random—Seething Song, Dance with Devils, Flamebreak. −6: Cast a copy of one of the following cards chosen at random—Hellion Eruption, Insurrection, Warp World.

card.name: Transcantation
card.property: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes a copy of Lightning Bolt. Its controller may choose new targets for it.

card.name: Trial and Error
card.property: Whenever Trial and Error is countered or fizzles, you may copy it and choose new targets for the copy. Trial and Error deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Geometric Weird
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, you may have Geometric Weird's base power and toughness each become equal to the greatest number of spells and abilities from different sources that were on the stack simultaneously that turn.

card.name: Whammy Burn
card.property: Shuffle your whammy deck, then reveal cards from the top of your whammy deck until you reveal an Island or choose to stop. Then, if no Islands were revealed this way, Whammy Burn deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed. (A whammy deck consists of a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest.)

card.name: Bear with Set's Mechanic
card.property: Vigilance Aggressive (During your turn, there is an additional combat phase after the first, and only creatures with aggressive may attack during it.)

card.name: Domesticated Mammoth
card.property: Domesticated Mammoth enters the battlefield with a token copy of Pacifism attached to it.

card.name: Experiment Five
card.property: {1}{Z}: Put a +1/+2 counter on Experiment Five. ({Z} is paid with one mana from any source that could produce two or more colors of mana.)

card.name: Frenemy of the Guildpact
card.property: Protection from enemy-colored multicolored (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything that's two enemy colors, such as blue and green.)

card.name: Generated Horizons
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Forest land token.

card.name: Gorilla Tactics
card.property: Create a 2/2 green Gorilla creature token. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Gorilla Tactics, create two 2/2 green Gorilla creature tokens.

card.name: Growth Charm
card.property: Choose one— • Rampant Growth • Giant Growth • Regrowth

card.name: Inspirational Antelope
card.property: Legacy — Before the game starts, choose a keyword or ability word and write it below. Spells with __________ you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Interplanar Brushwagg
card.property: Interplanar (This creature enters onto the interplanar battlefield. Players can't control creatures on the interplanar battlefield.) Vigilance, haste Whenever a player attacks with a creature with power 4 or greater, Interplanar Brushwagg also attacks the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

card.name: Krosan Adaptation
card.property: Enchant creature Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies. The copies enter the battlefield as tokens.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has vigilance.

card.name: Maro's Gone Nuts
card.property: Double any effect that doubles. (It quadruples.)

card.name: Patient Turtle
card.property: Patient Turtle enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't go first this game.

card.name: Plane-Merge Elf
card.property: Landship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's a land, you may reveal it. If you do, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. Kinfall — Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it shares a creature type with Plane-Merge Elf, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Soulmates
card.property: Enchant two creatures Enchanted creatures each get +1/+1 and have hexproof. When one of the enchanted creatures dies, destroy the other.

card.name: Vazal, the Compleat
card.property: Megalegendary (Your deck can have only one copy of this card.) Vigilance, trample Vazal, the Compleat has the activated abilities of all other permanents on the battlefield.

card.name: A Good Thing
card.property: Spells and abilities you control can't destroy, exile, target, or cause you to sacrifice A Good Thing. At the beginning of your upkeep, double your life total. Then, if you have 1,000 or more life, you lose the game.

card.name: Abian, Luvion Usurper
card.property: As Abian, Luvion Usurper enters the battlefield, you become Abian. (Your life total becomes equal to their loyalty. You can activate the loyalty abilities by spending or gaining life.) +3: Discard your hand, then draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. +1: Create a 3/2 red and green Spirit creature token. −X: You deal X damage to any target.

card.name: Bind // Liberate
card.property: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card. // Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

alternate.name: Bind
alternate.property: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.

alternate.name: Liberate
alternate.property: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Bucket List
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell of a type showing on Bucket List, put a counter over that type and draw a card. If all five types on Bucket List have counters over them, sacrifice it and draw one more card. ☐ artifact ☐ creature ☐ enchantment ☐ instant ☐ sorcery

card.name: Evil Boros Charm
card.property: Choose one— • Evil Boros Charm deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life. • Unblocked attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn. • Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with lifelink and haste.

card.name: Golgari Death Swarm
card.property: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Graveyard Dig
card.property: Return up to two target [black or green] creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. You may cast this spell for {2}{B/G}{B/G}. If you do, ignore the bracketed text.

card.name: How to Keep an Izzet Mage Busy
card.property: Return How to Keep an Izzet Mage Busy to its owner's hand.

card.name: Kaya, Ghost Haunter
card.property: 0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Haunter haunting target creature for as long as that creature remains on the battlefield. −1: You get an emblem with, "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to the owner of target haunted creature." −2: You get an emblem with, "At the beginning of your upkeep, gain control of target haunted creature for as long as it remains haunted."

card.name: Louvaq, the Aberrant
card.property: Protection from modified creatures (Modified creatures have a power, toughness, or ability different than their printed versions.) At the beginning of each player's end step, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature that player controls.

card.name: Personal Decoy
card.property: Personal Decoy enters the battlefield with a number of loyalty counters on it equal to your life total. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. You can't be attacked. +1: You gain 1 life. −4: Draw a card.

card.name: Pick Your Poison
card.property: Choose any number of modes that total exactly 4. You may choose the same mode more than once. [1] Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. [2] Create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch. [4] All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Seek Bolas's Counsel
card.property: Choose one at random— • You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, pay {U}{B}{R}. If you don't, you lose the game." • Each player discards their hand. • Planeswalk to Pools of Becoming. (Once there, you can roll the planar die only if you're playing Planechase.) • For each opponent, exile cards from the top of their library until you exile a nonland card. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs. • Destroy all creatures and non-Bolas planeswalkers. • You get an emblem with "You can cast nonland cards from your sideboard."

card.name: Sliv-Mizzet, Hivemind
card.property: Slivers you control have flying and "Whenever you draw a card, this creature deals 1 damage to any target" and "{T}: Draw a card."

card.name: Smelt // Herd // Saw

alternate.name: Herd
alternate.property: Create three 2/2 green Elk creature tokens.

card.name: Start // Fire

alternate.name: Start
alternate.property: Create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens with vigilance.

alternate.name: Fire
alternate.property: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

card.name: Slivdrazi Monstrosity

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Eldrazi you control are Slivers in addition to their other types. Slivers you control have devoid and annihilator 1. {3}: Create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Sliver creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

card.name: Wrath of Sod
card.property: Put a manabond counter on all creatures. (They lose all other abilities and become lands with "{T}: Add one mana of this card's color.")

card.name: Zyym, Mesmeric Lord
card.property: Flying, deathtouch When Zyym, Mesmeric Lord enters the battlefield, target opponent chooses an order for the cards in their hand, then reveals them one by one until you say stop. That player then discards the most recently revealed card.

card.name: Chronobot
card.property: When Chronobot enters the battlefield, switch upkeep steps with target opponent for as long as it remains on the battlefield. (You take your upkeep on their turn, and they take their upkeep on your turn.)

card.name: Lantern of Undersight
card.property: You draw cards from the bottom of your library instead of the top of your library.

card.name: Mirrored Lotus
card.property: Reflect {0} (As this enters the battlefield, each opponent may pay {0}. When they do, they create a token copy of this except it lacks this ability.) {T}, Exile Mirrored Lotus: Add three mana of any one color.

card.name: Pithing Spyglass
card.property: As Pithing Spyglass enters the battlefield, name a keyword ability or ability word. All cards in all zones lose that keyword ability or ability word and all text tied to that ability.

card.name: Puresteel Angel
card.property: Flying, indestructible When Puresteel Angel enters the battlefield, exile all artifacts that aren't colorless. Whenever Puresteel Angel deals combat damage to a player, you get an emblem with "If you would lose the game, instead your life total becomes 20, shuffle your graveyard into your library, you lose all poison counters, and you lose this emblem."

card.name: Unicycle
card.property: First strike, haste Equipped creature has first strike and haste. Equip {1} Crew 1

card.name: Weaponized Scrap
card.property: Upgrade (This creature enters the battlefield covering another artifact you control. If it can't, exile it. Ignore the artifact it's covering. Anywhere this card goes, cards underneath it also go. It has haste.)

card.name: Aggressive Crag
card.property: At the beginning of your combat step, tap Aggressive Crag. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Barry's Land
card.property: {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Domesticated Watercourse
card.property: Domesticated Watercourse enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {U}{B}: Until end of turn, Domesticated Watercourse becomes an Equipment artifact with equip {2}. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Enchanted Prairie
card.property: Enchanted Prairie enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Gold Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Legacy — {T}, Mark one of Gold Mine's unmarked nodes: Add one mana of any color. ☐, ☐, ☐, ☐, ☐

card.name: Jasconian Isle
card.property: (Jasconian Isle isn't a spell, it's affected by summoning sickness, it's blue, and it has "{T}: Add {U}.") Jasconian Isle enters the battlefield tapped. Jasconian Isle doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}{U}. If you do, untap Jasconian Isle.

card.name: Noxious Bayou
card.property: {T}: Add {B} or {G}. You get a poison counter.

card.name: Rift
card.property: Before drawing your hand, you may start the game with Rift in your opening hand. If you do, draw one fewer card. (Mulligans continue as normal.) Rift enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Taiga Stadium
card.property: Taiga Stadium enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a white, blue, or black permanent. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Waste Land
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Waste Land: Destroy target nonbasic land. That land's controller creates a Wastes land token. (It has {T}: Add {C}.)
